text_elements.typography_notes: The cursive script is elegant but may affect readability at smaller sizes.

symbol.description: Heart shape integrated into the text

color_palette.contrast_notes: High contrast with a white background ensures readability.

layout.balance_notes: Well-balanced with the heart shape adding visual interest.
layout.spacing_notes: Adequate spacing between letters enhances readability.

issues.description: Cursive font may be hard to read at small sizes.

improvement_cues.suggestion: Consider a bolder font for smaller applications.

trend_alignment.notes: Aligns with current trends favoring simplicity and elegance.
